Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: Vance
Reviews.Content: I have a handful of these stretching from one side of the house to the other and in all different places. Some are running under the vents outside and some through walls into the room where the DVR is. Rain or shine, all seems to hold well and I have not picked up interference at all. This is a dual cable only - power and video so if you need audio, look elsewhere. The connections fit proper and snugly (power connection hold nicely) but to protect it from moisture and condensation I was using outside electric tape at first but eventually am switching to PlasticDip. It's great - just use some alcohol moistened cloth to clean (unpowered) connection point and then I took a 2" wide brush and painted PlastiDip all around it. Once cured, it's solidly sealed from the elements. It's outer coat has not been easily cut yet either (which a few time I'm surprised).I am happy saving a couple bucks per 65' cable since I have about 6 cams now with 2 nanny cams going in soon. They fit connections from Swaan cams, QSee indoor/outdoor bullet style, and the generic dome NV cam. No complaints so far and it's been 3 or so months now of freezing and icy weather. This was installed running from outside in during August weather so it's been through some warm season as well. I like them.

Reviews.Title: Quality cable good price
Reviews.Author: scrapant
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these cables last week for $6.00. There was only one left in stock. The price is almost double now.This cable is well constructed, definatly a thicker guage. Better for your higher amperage camera's.  Even at $12.00 its still a good deal. Its good to find a quality product for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Nice, heavy duty.
Reviews.Author: David L. "D"
Reviews.Content: Quality cable. I am satisfied! It's not some cheap cable, it has good solid connectors and image quality doesn't see to degrade over this lone line.

Reviews.Title: It works well
Reviews.Author: Bill H
Reviews.Content: This is actually the second one of these that I bought.  The first had a minor ding in the cable but the cosmetic flaw did not affect performance and the second one was perfect.  It is far more sturdy than the flimsy cable that came with a camera I bought.  There was no interference and that is why I like the wired cameras better than a wireless I have that often gets bad static.

Reviews.Title: They are ok.
Reviews.Author: Ronald Wood
Reviews.Content: The order arrived on time and in perfect condition. The only problem I have is that both ends of the BNC connectors are males. One should have been a female connector in my mind. Nothing that a female to female adapter won't take care of.

Reviews.Title: 65 feet BNC Video Cable
Reviews.Author: junior
Reviews.Content: good value for the price, good quality,fit perfect on my cameras. can be used outdoor in any area of your house.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as advertised
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Works as it should, long enough to reach most any location. Wire shielding is very skinny, but doesn't appear to produce and interference.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: Oddi S. Diaz
Reviews.Content: I rated five stars because it does what it supposed to. It is very reliable and not expensive at all. I will buy more from this seller.

Reviews.Title: bnc was good and got on time for project
Reviews.Author: DOYLE J. HEIMANN
Reviews.Content: great just what I needed and got on time for project have purchased before and will again if need too.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: New Wii
Reviews.Content: This cable has been installed for about 2 weeks now and is working great. I was surprised at how much thicker this cable is compared to my other BNC Cables. Great length for people who are not sure if 50 feet will be enough.

Reviews.Title: Well-constructed 65-foot Cable
Reviews.Author: Miles L.
Reviews.Content: I've ordered other cables for my CCTV cameras, but this one is the best so far.  It's heavier than the others, but that's a good thing.  The wire is thicker and the connectors seem well-constructed.  I had no problem running it through my attic.  Picture quality is just as good as the others.  And for one of my cameras, I needed the extra 15 feet because of its location.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: paula L
Reviews.Content: My hubby said he wanted a heavy duty wire to run cameras thru the woods. These wires exceeds his expectations. The only thing is that they should come in longer lengths

Reviews.Title: Excellent wire
Reviews.Author: Spiderman
Reviews.Content: Same quality as what came with Lorex CCTV 16 channel 700tvl systems.BNC Female to Female Coupler Adapters Pack of 10 Amazon sells for $4, was able to added additional feet with no loss of quality of picture.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: The 65 Feet BNC Video Cable with Power Wire for Cameras works great.  It was purchased at a good price and it works very well.  This was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Well made security camera cable
Reviews.Author: That Guy
Reviews.Content: Well made cable- much better than most of the other security camera cables offered on amazon.  Great quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: great cable
Reviews.Author: ARD GROUP INC
Reviews.Content: A great and durable cable for cctv cameras. I use these on all my cameras and the quality is excellent and ling lasting.

Reviews.Title: Thick and hefty
Reviews.Author: Calvin
Reviews.Content: Very hefty. Seperate wires for power  and video but didn't notice any difference in video quality from cheap thin cable.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: kk
Reviews.Content: This is for my cams. Much, much cheaper to buy through Amazon. you need protection so get motivated and buy cams and protect your property.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Timothy Young
Reviews.Content: This shipped fast and it is great. The product exceeded my expectations in quality it is a heavy duty and was better then the one that shipped with my system A++++ and 6 stars out of 5 way to go.

Reviews.Title: CIB BNC VIDEO CABLE W/POWER WIRE
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Item matched up with my Swann camera system and was an instant fix for my one failed camera.  Product details were on mark for this application.

Reviews.Title: just what
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: fast shipping packed well an is just what I need  for my security cameras. I will use again as long as i get  the rest of my order

Reviews.Title: CIB 65 feet BNC Video Cable
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Ferrara Jr.
Reviews.Content: l like this cable because it's more heavier than others and have better quality video picture.l rate this item 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Nice Cables
Reviews.Author: Steven A Senus
Reviews.Content: Works great with my DVR security system, added the length from my secuity camera to the actual DVR.  Would buy more.

Reviews.Title: Higher quality cable
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a thin cheap cable, and I was pleasantly surprised. It is a much higher quality cable than I was expecting for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Did not work for my hd-sdi camera
Reviews.Author: bharat n.
Reviews.Content: No  signal from this cable  This donot work for hd-sdi camera system from hd sdi camera to hd sdi dvr system

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: brentr
Reviews.Content: High quality. I have about 8 of these running 6 cameras and no degradation of image quality. I wish they came in 100 ft lengths but you can use 2 of them together.
